    • Method Detail

      • getCanvas

        public javafx.scene.canvas.Canvas getCanvas()

      • initialize

        public void initialize(MasterController masterController)
        Sets master controller, creates an instance of the GameOfLife2D object and prepares the grid and gets the Graphics Content of the canvas. Also it sets up listeners and prepare the animation. Final it launches the animation.

      • clamp

        public int clamp(int val,
                 int min,
                 int max)
        Keeps the val between min and max
        Parameters:
        val - input to be checked
        min - minimum value
        max - maximum value
        Returns:
        val in range of min and max

      • renderCanvas

        public void renderCanvas()
        Renders everything on the canvas

      • renderLife

        public void renderLife()
        Renders the current state of the game of life simulation to the canvas. Sets background color and cell color.

      • renderGridLines

        public void renderGridLines()
        Draws the grid lines on the canvas

      • renderImport

        public void renderImport()
        Renders the imported pattern on the canvas around the mouse position

      • clearGrid

        public void clearGrid()
        Kills all cells on grid

      • drawLine

        public void drawLine(int x,
                     int y,
                     int x2,
                     int y2)
        creates a line of alive cells on the grid from cell (x,y) to cell (x2, y2)
        Parameters:
        x - THe first coordinate of the first cell
        y - The second coordinate of the first cell
        x2 - The first coordinate of the end cell
        y2 - The second coordinate of the end cell
